questions.label: Are your business vehicles insured?
questions.helpText: Business vehicle insurance protects against accidents, theft, and damage. It's typically required by law and protects your business from liability.

No.title: Insure your vehicles
No.body: Vehicle insurance helps cover repair costs and liability. Operating uninsured vehicles can expose your business to significant financial risk.

questions.label: How many vehicles are in your fleet?
questions.helpText: Fleet size affects insurance costs, maintenance schedules, and tracking requirements. Consider telematics for larger fleets.
